mapper.select: SELECT t.*, u.name student_name, u.img_url, tag.name course_name, tt.homework course_homework FROM `student_timtable` t LEFT JOIN `sys_user` u ON u.id = t.student_id LEFT JOIN `course` c ON c.id = t.course_id LEFT JOIN `tag` ON tag.id = c.tag_id LEFT JOIN `teacher_timetable` tt ON tt.teacher_id = t.teacher_id WHERE t.course_id = #{courseId}
